project_descr: This project will provide support to national institutions responsible for economic management and evidence-based policy, planning and budgeting to achieve inclusive growth and poverty reduction in the Gambia.

outputs.output_descr: to support and facilitate the implementation of sustainable development goals and entrench evidence based policy planning at national and subnational level

Development Effectiveness activities carried out by UNDP staff which include; a) Strategic Programme Planning and Quality Assurance; b) Programme/Project Development and Management; and c) Programme Policy Advisory Services. Additionally the UNDP in the Gambia has supported the resource mobilization efforts for programmes/projects. The Development Effectiveness activities are carried out by UNDP regardless of implementation modality and therefore are applicable to all projects

document_name: Economic Management and Governance for Inclusive Growth and Evidence Based Policy Formulation and Implementation
project_title: eco. mgt & evidenc-based policy, planning & budgeting
